userChatBubble.label: Use Chat Bubble for User Messages

ragEnabled.label: Chat with website using vector embeddings

visitSpecificWebsite.label: Visit the website mentioned in the message

deleteChatHistory.label: System Reset

export.label: Export Chat History, Knowledge Base, and Prompts

import.label: Import Chat History, Knowledge Base, and Prompts

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this model?

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt?
confirm.importContent: This will replace all existing prompts with the default set of 16 prompts. Are you sure you want to continue?

prompt.help: You can use {key} as variable in your prompt.

notification.deletedSuccessDesc: The prompt has been deleted successfully

url.label: Page Share URL
url.required: Please input your Page Share URL!
url.help: For privacy reasons, you can self-host the page share and provide the URL here. <anchor>Learn More</anchor>.

webshare.heading: Web Share

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this share? This action cannot be undone.

webshare.label: Manage Page Share
webshare.description: Enable or disable the page share feature

notification.someError: Something went wrong. Please try again later

globalEnable.label: Enable or Disable Ollama Integration Globally
globalEnable.warning: By disabling Ollama integration globally, Aurora won't fetch models from Ollama. You can still add Ollama instance from the <anchor>OpenAI compatible API</anchor> section which will work fine.

advanced.label: Advance Ollama URL Configuration

urlRewriteEnabled.label: Enable or Disable Custom Origin URL

autoCORSFix.label: Enable or Disable Automatic Ollama CORS Fix

advanced.help: If you have connection issues with Ollama on Aurora, you can configure a custom origin URL. To learn more about the configuration, <anchor>click here</anchor>.

about.title: About
about.heading: About
about.vision.en: Aurora is the dawn's light, a guiding beacon leading everyone into the world of AI!
about.vision.en.description: We hope Aurora will be like an enlightening teacher, illuminating our path towards AI and Web3 blockchain future networks! AI and Web3 blockchain core technologies will drive the fourth industrial revolution, Let's explore the infinite possibilities of the future network together!
about.vision.zh: Aurora是黎明的曙光，是引领大家迈向AI世界指路明灯！
about.vision.zh.description: 期望Aurora如同启蒙老师一样，点亮我们走向AI、Web3区块链未来网络的道路！ AI人工智能、Web3区块链核心技术将驱动第四次工业革命的浪潮，让我们一起探索未来网络的无限可能！

model.label: Embedding Model
model.help: Highly recommended to use embedding models like `nomic-embed-text`.

totalFilePerKB.label: Knowledge Base Default File Upload Limit
totalFilePerKB.required: Please enter the default file upload limit

noOfRetrievedDocs.label: Number of Retrieved Documents
noOfRetrievedDocs.required: Please enter the number of retrieved documents
